author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Takeda Pharmaceutical Says Considers Making Approach To Shire On Possible Offer
text:
March 28 (Reuters) - Takeda Pharmaceutical Co Ltd:
* ‍TAKEDA STATEMENT REGARDING SHIRE PLC​ * ‍CONFIRMS THAT IT IS CONSIDERING MAKING AN APPROACH TO SHIRE REGARDING A POSSIBLE OFFER
* CONSIDERATION OF SUCH AN OFFER IS AT A PRELIMINARY AND EXPLORATORY STAGE AND NO APPROACH HAS BEEN MADE TO BOARD OF SHIRE
* ‍TAKEDA MUST, BY NO LATER THAN 5.00 P.M. ON 25 APRIL 2018, EITHER ANNOUNCE A FIRM INTENTION TO MAKE AN OFFER OR NOT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
